# Selection analysis

```{r 1Pop, eval=FALSE}
popStatsDescWindows.py --snp wilding.unifiedGenotyper.cov14x.passQC.phased.zarr/ -b bed  -o LBVwil --keep LBVwil.ind -a accessibility.h5 -wt snp -w 500
popStatsDescWindows.py --snp wilding.unifiedGenotyper.cov14x.passQC.phased.zarr/ -b bed  -o LPdom --keep LPdom.ind -a ag1000g/accessibility.h5 -wt snp -w 500
popStatsDescWindows.py --snp wilding.unifiedGenotyper.cov14x.passQC.phased.zarr/ -b bed  -o LPfor --keep LPfor.ind -a ag1000g/accessibility.h5 -wt snp -w 500
```

```{r 2Pop, eval=FALSE}
fst_scan.py --zarr wilding.unifiedGenotyper.cov14x.passQC.phased.zarr/ --pop1 LPdom.ind --pop2 LPfor.ind -o LPdom_LPfor -w 500
fst_scan.py --zarr wilding.unifiedGenotyper.cov14x.passQC.phased.zarr/ --pop1 LPdom.ind --pop2 LBVwil.ind -o LPdom_LBVwil -w 500
fst_scan.py --zarr wilding.unifiedGenotyper.cov14x.passQC.phased.zarr/ --pop1 LPfor.ind --pop2 LBVwil.ind -o LPfor_LBVwil -w 500
```


```{r 3Pop, eval=FALSE}
getPBS_scan.py --pop1 LPdom.ind --pop2 LPfor.ind --pop3 LBVwil.ind --zarr wilding.unifiedGenotyper.cov14x.passQC.phased.zarr/ -o LPdom_LPfor_LBVwil -w 500
getPBS_scan.py --pop1 LBVwil.ind --pop2 LPdom.ind --pop3 LPfor.ind --zarr wilding.unifiedGenotyper.cov14x.passQC.phased.zarr/ -o LBVwil_LPdom_LPfor -w 500
getPBS_scan.py --pop1 LBVwil.ind --pop2 LPfor.ind --pop3 LPdom.ind --zarr wilding.unifiedGenotyper.cov14x.passQC.phased.zarr/ -o LBVwil_LPfor_LPdom -w 500
```
